title: Kono Sekai ga Game da to, Ore dake ga Shitte Iru (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Award-winning Work   Beastkin   Clever Protagonist   Demon Lord   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Gamers   Kuudere   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Parody   Pragmatic Protagonist   R-15   Sword And Magic   Transported into a Game World   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Usber
description:
Popular for being filled with bugs, the virtual-reality game New Communicate Online (a.k.a. Nekomimi Neko Offline).

A die-hard fan of the game, Sagara Souma, is sent to the game world from the power of a mysterious device.

Though surprised by the sudden turn of events, Souma conveniently knows the laws of the world.

Mastering every bug, using the game’s logic against it, he is soon known as “Maverick Swordsman Souma.”>
